andromeda.why: Early enthusiasm without foundation is personal training work, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Builds the practice container first—drills, basics, repeatability before display.

draco.why: Status-posturing: ‘look skilled’ before the skill is real.

lyra.why: Not yet an artistic-display axis; foundation precedes style.

orion-dark.why: Clinging to formulas/doctrine as a shortcut to competence.

orion-light.why: Discipline to practice quietly and resist premature performance.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing/attunement helps tolerate the slow build of skill.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching skill formation; no sacred instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Curating what to practice ≠ anti-domination intervention.

arcturus.why: Methodical repetition and clean technique stabilize the learning container.

lyra.why: Talent begins to show as stylish execution grounded in practice.

orion-dark.why: Rigid schooling for compliance over true mastery.

orion-light.why: Disciplined training under the small, daily ordeal of drills.

pleiades.why: Supportive pacing and care keep motivation nourished.

sirius.why: Skill formation without explicit teaching/codification yet.

andromeda.why: Trial-and-error with performance is self-mastery, not rescue.

draco.why: Competitive status-jockeying and clique defense around ‘talent.’

lyra.why: Experimental showings—creative risk even when not fully ready.

orion-dark.why: Defaulting to crowd-pleasing formulas to escape uncertainty.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of perseverance: keep practicing after visible mistakes.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing erodes the integrity of practice choices.

sirius.why: Self-forging stage; no transmission of law/method yet.

andromeda.why: Scaling skill into patterns is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Converts talent into teachable method—drills, checklists, demonstrable steps.

draco.why: Gatekeeping on who ‘qualifies’ to learn or join the troupe.

lyra.why: Charismatic performance inspires adoption—cultural beacon of craft.

orion-dark.why: Turning style into orthodoxy; doctrine over living craft.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-demo: others face the ordeal of aligning to real technique.

pleiades.why: Attuned coaching and timing improve uptake of method.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-performance: the method itself teaches through demonstration.

andromeda.why: Refuses coerced performance; guards artistic sovereignty under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix the whole show’ → burnout/scapegoat when one-size-fits-all fails.

draco.why: Status policing and access games in the scene/venue.

lyra.why: Iconic talent—visible cultural signal of craft and style.

orion-dark.why: Industry/orthodoxy capture—enforcing style compliance to preserve control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—keep practicing what’s true, not what flatters.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing setlists and over-accommodation dilute mastery.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: models clean craft choices despite crowd pressure.

andromeda.why: Protects artistic sovereignty; refuses capture by industry or fashion.

arcturus.why: Elder craftmaster—maintains standards and sustainable training systems.

draco.why: Legacy rank rigidity and correctness policing can creep in.

lyra.why: Role-model artistry—beauty and style as a cultural beacon.

orion-dark.why: Turning schools of style into dogma/hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: disciplined devotion to mastery over image.

pleiades.why: Focus is mastery and standards, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Craft sage—teaches the law of mastery through lineage-quality demonstration.
